idea:
Our Website

KiranaKart is an online marketplace that connects customers with small grocery shops (called Kiranas) in India. Essentially, we let users order their groceries from any Kirana in their area through a simple and convenient interface that ensures quick deliveries.

name: INFIGRITY

idea:
Bizstart (www.bizstart.in) is a virtual platform for aspiring business owners to help them decide what business they can start. Users can study detailed financial inputs required to start any particular business. 


The website is designed like a Google Search engine where users can write any business they are looking for. 


Bizstart obtains the financial inputs required to start any particular business straight from the horse’s mouth – current business owners thriving in their respective domains.


Users can study financial numbers required for each business. They can also schedule calls with existing business owners (who are empanelled on Bizstart0 to get all their pressing questions answered.


Bizstart currently has 155 different businesses LIVE across industries. The business owners behind each of these businesses have been screened and formally (signing  legal agreement) empanelled so that users can get on a call with them in exchange for a nominal fee. The availability of business owners is managed on real time as each of the business owner has a login to manage their availability. 


Users can also hire 6 Business service providers i.e. Business Planner, Financer, Lawyer, Chartered Accountant, Website Developer and Advertising Agency, services that almost all new business owners need. 


In phase 2, we are adding a Business Aptitude Assessment so that users can take the assessment which will guide them to relevant businesses that they should start.
name: BIZSTART ADVISORY SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Uniform Junction is robust technology platform, which will empower schools digitally, simplify supply chain for them & enable them to offer world class products to their students.


Uniform Junction’s offering will for the first time provide schools the choice of integrating all their requirements for effective education services to K12 students with a single partner and focus on delivering quality education to students. More importantly, it will enable and equip schools in non-metro cities to gain access to the best in global and futuristic education & also be better prepared to adapt to the new National Education Policy
name: MAF TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. To carry on business of manufacturing, selling, purchasing, importing, exporting,  servicing, acting as agent, broker and otherwise dealing in all types of UV air disinfection  devices and other disinfection devices, instruments, appliances, equipment’s, accessories  and component parts. 

2. To Carry on the business of and to act as importers, distributors, stockiest, marketer  dealers, or exporters in all kinds of medical appliances like UV Sterilizers, Disinfectants  and various other related medical equipment with accessories and all other allied medical  disposable product.
name: VIRASHIELD LLP

idea: Established in the year 2019 we” Mabelle Solutions Private Limited.” is a Manufacturer of the wide spectrum Scrub Pads etc. We are manufacturing these products using premium grade raw material that is procured from the authentic vendors of the market. We offer these products at reasonable rates and deliver these within the promised time-frame.
name: MABELLE SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We plan to provide credit products viz, personal loans, buy now pay later, credit enabled prepaid cards, API based payment options to consumers to meet their emergency cash requirements, finance their need for purchase of essential goods and services & payment of utilities.

The way we intend to differentiate ourselves to be able to deliver credit products to the underserved is by leveraging the pillars of data sciences, technology and regulatory enablers and frameworks.

The underwriting of the customer’s credit worthiness would be done using alternative data, artificial intelligence, machine learning models, data analytics. Unlike the dependency of traditional institution on bureau information, leveraging large data generated due to the smartphone revolution to enable us to generate credit worthiness for new to credit customers. AI/ML models will help us assess risks and make unbiased underwriting decisions, allowing for intelligent risk assessment without human intervention.
name: EASY PLATFORM SERVICES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Company is formed to carry on in India or elsewhere the business of technical, legal, financial and management consultants, advisers, innovators, software,  designer, marketers, fund managers, administrators, agents, recruitment and placement consultancy service providers.
